summary: A small mod to make unique mudcrab your follower.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Description:[/size]
[size=4]Old Salty is a unique mudcrab, added with the Dragonborn DLC. He can be found at [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Northshore_Landing]Northshore Landing[/url] and will follow you upon talking to him. [/size]

[size=5]Instalation:[/size]

[size=4]Use NMM or simply drop whatever is in the archive to your Skyrim folder.[/size]


[size=5]Stats for nerds:[/size]

[list]
[*][size=4]Starting health: 50. Health regeneration: 15/per sec. Allowed health regeneration in combat.[/size]
[*][size=4]Starting stamina 60. Stamina regeneration: 15/per sec.[/size]
[*][size=4]Modified damage, so he is at least a little useful in combat.[/size]
[*][size=4]Carry weight: 100.[/size]
[*][size=4]Levels up from 1 to 45. However his level is always half that of the player.[/size]
[/list]
[size=5]Issues:
[/size]
[list]
[*][size=4]Sometimes you might need to tell Old Salty to wait and then to follow you before he actually starts following.[/size]
[*][size=4]If you can't click on a dialogue, try save/reload or reloading your computer - it may be caused by low RAM.[/size]
[/list][size=5]
[/size]Conclusion:
The mod is pretty basic, but feel free to inform me if you ever find a bug. Reviews and comments are really appreciated.

Credit:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/44658702]MichaelStark87[/url] for requesting the mod.
author: Alika1
